message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire it. I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects its high quality and unique features. I look forward to hearing your response.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $12000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I must maintain the value of our product. I am unable to accept $9500. I am proposing a counteroffer of $10500 for the product. This price still reflects its high quality and unique features, while being more reasonable than my initial offer. I hope this aligns better with your budget.
I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget, Alice. While $10500 is closer to what I'm looking for, I still feel it's out of reach. I would like to make a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for considering my previous offers, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. I am now proposing a counteroffer of $10250 for the product. This price aims to balance the value of the product with your budgetary considerations. I hope this offer is more acceptable to you.
Thank you for your continued effort, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to make a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your patience during these negotiations. I am now prepared to offer the product to you for $10125. This price reflects a compromise between the value of the product and your budget constraints. I hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to make a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

I see that we're still working towards a mutually agreeable price, Bob. I am now offering the product to you for $10062.50. This price is slightly above your last counteroffer and aims to provide a fair compromise while reflecting the value of the product. I hope this offer will be more suitable for your budget.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to make a final counteroffer of $10000 for the product.
